column4:
- Dry contact control
- BLE 5.0 is of very low radiation to ensure healthy living
- Powerful mesh networking capabilities,no gateway
- Lamps grouping configurable
- Scene mode settings
- Timer settings
- You can control your lights with the wall switch or an intuitive and visual user interface on your smart or tablet
- Switch connectable to 240VAC max. or 24VDC max.
- Device firmware updated over-the-air
